name: My AI Inc.
description: Developer of a blockchain-based loyalty rewards protocol platform intended to standardize and enhance the value of loyalty rewards. The company's platform allows bands of any size to create rewards that can be instantly redeemed across loyalty programs from around the world, they give brands all the control of a closed program with all the retention and new customer acquisition benefits of an open program, with one simple API (application programming interface) integration, thereby allowing bands of any size to create rewards that can be instantly redeemed across loyalty programs from around the world.
one_liner: Developer of a blockchain-based loyalty rewards protocol platform intended to standardize and enhance the value of loyalty rewards. The company's platform allows bands of any size to create rewards that can be instantly redeemed across loyalty programs from around the world, they give brands all the control of a closed program with all the retention and new customer acquisition benefits of an open program, with one simple API (application programming interface) integration, thereby allowing bands of any size to create rewards that can be instantly redeemed across loyalty programs from around the world.
